content: it is there, it is so
or does a fact not require any effort to meet it
do i meet it verbally, that being i come up with a plan or a system to meditate on it later and progressively end it
and so i am left with this tremendous feeling
im constantly depending on another, even though i might be envious or afraid theyll leave me. so it still is there even when i try escape
all my escape methods merely dull it or put it off, agony is never fully understood
all my effort goes into trying to alleviate it
right, i can see how all my relationships are marred by this agony
its very important you see it, not just verbally
is that a fact to you or are you just playing with words
that is what is happening, can i stay completely with this? not my interpretation or opinion of it, but the actual agony
you can make jokes all you want but they dont cover up the agony of my relationships, nor the confusion of my everyday living
theyre all meaningless to me now
and im aware of all the escapes methods i have created and refined over the years
when the mind is completely alone, no longer depending on another then there is clarity on how i am tricking myself
when i depend on another for my joy, things get messier and even more complicated
no one can comfort or solve this thing for me, i see that as a fact
that isnt to say i dont speak to anyone, i still engage with people. but i must see this thing through entirely alone
i must meet this problem completely psychologically on my own
see what we have done to ourselves
just an illusion, in which i invest all my energy and effort keeping up this charade
all this effort and for what
endlessly all the time, tirelessly avoiding my deep pain
and i see how i escape from myself
the understanding of myself is not some belief system at all, it is as intimate to me as anything could be
the understanding of everyday life is not a conclusion, it is an endless stream
this should bring you to tears what we do to ourselves
not a belief or an idea, it is as real to me as my heart beating
or my lack of discipline, i see it, it is there
i am seeing for myself the dirtiness of my room, or the sickening greed of the politicians
this isnt a sentimental conclusion, or a romantic way of looking at things
the fact of my life as it stands right now is all i have
it is utterly my responsibility, my mind is completely alone in this
and i see all this pain and i realise deep down that only i can care for it. no politician or group will save me
it is a precious gem, just watch it. its all you have
this is me, and i have nothing else
the effort, the failures the greed the ruthlessness and misery of the world
this is our life it is all there is
watch it carefully with all you have, its tremendously beautiful if it has attention given to it
look as it happens
so i invent scenarios in the future where i am whole as an escape right?
and yet, despite my life being so very painful, my relationships confusing, my future uncertain i want to continue something so desperately
just the plain fact of everyday life as a human being
and so im never quite meeting my daily problems, im always putting things off or avoiding them right?
this is just a fact to me, it doesn’t require a belief in a group or a god
and so when i meet my problem with my past experience, it never seems to fully resolve the anguish that lays underneath it right?
and how i meet this challenge depends completely on my conditioning, what language i speak what political group i belong to etc etc
and so as i am living an everyday life, i have a challenge
the everyday travails of living
we are just referring to daily life, not some far away mystical state
and watch ones activity as it happens
thats alright if you drop off for a moment, just come back if you have the energy
ah well that has no meaning if it isnt seen presently
but what is it that is continuing?
we are constantly looking for reward and to continue
and so why have we continued in this absurd pattern? what is this sense of incompleteness that drives our behaviour
right, this isnt new to you? its the same pattern yeah
and so as we grow older, this is the same conditioning that is present, we must do our laundry and must appear respectable
even as children, we are told to put in more effort into our homework and to sit still for long periods of time, effort effort effort
a mind that isn’t clear is constantly choosing, because we are conditioned this way
a sense of me choosing two paths
however when there is something that isn’t enjoyable, this sense of choice comes up
you love it, it is so
so this state of non effort arises because theres no decision required for when you love something
okay lets start there, when you enjoy something theres no effort right?
youre not dense dont apologise
why is there an effort at all?
and so all our efforts are using this tool of thought, we want to investigate what the tool is
because the tool we use is thought, ie ‘she’s much smarter than i am, i need to appear more intelligent to be impressive’
but this is the structure we are looking at, can there be an understanding of that without making effort?
we always need a plan or some sort of safety net, which requires time
can you understand something without any controlling or planning to ‘get’ it? try it out
you dont need to make an effort to bring about any change or transformative insight, effort is always trying to bring something about
it’s completely up to you, theres no need to depend on anyone else to undetstand your subjective experience
yeah this process isnt adding anything new to your life, you dont need to think up any new way of looking at life. ultimately you’re just dissolving what you think to be true about the world
lol what are you doing julien
but of course when the brain dies, as does the knowledge. so theres no security in knowledge either
we are constantly seeking certainty, and so knowledge becomes something to hold into
when theres a model theres no complete understanding
no exceptions
if you fully understand it then it never repeats
then theres no problem
theres an immense depth to the whole thing, only you can look at it
i cant help you look at it or comfort you
yes, so look at it
so we want to look at actual experience, not what brings about fear into my life, but what fear actually is and how destructive it can be
so the superficial reason for my fear isnt important, it changes every week
during every stage of life this has been the pattern, when you were 10 you wanted a toy and now youre older you want something else
and so i find some other little thing to worry about
but the lack hasnt gone anywhere
and so i work and push and exert effort to bring about a change, and maybe the characteristic does get a little better or what not
the characteristic is a superficial thing, the sense of lack goes much much deeper. but theres comfort in trying to control a small part of myself
right, i have a characteristic that most don’t and i wish that i was different. theres a lack there, a sense of incompleteness
this insistence on control is driven by a sense of not having achieved enough
that is our approach to ordinary life, i must push i must control
our everyday life is categorised by this constant resistance, to achieve something i must pull my sleeves up and work as hard as i can
not the interpretation of the emptiness, but the genuine fact of lack
there is a tremendous lack inwardly
whats the confusion? this is a fact right
and so thought sees this, and attempts to suppress it, which is our conditioning. our approach to life
because the mind is constantly emptying itself, and that fact is utterly terrifying
without effort
but naturally fades away
not forces itself out
and in this awareness the psychological structure dissolves itself?
and in that attention, one sees how thought is creating an observer apart from the emptiness
can one be so attentive that thought doesnt jump in to cover this emptiness?
theres this tremendous emptiness that is looming as a result of this threat and thought is trying to cover it up
so theres a threat to this structure that i have built up about myself, this person is better than me in whatever avenue im comparing myself in
more importantly, is the observer the one who is affected by the premise actually a distinct entity to it?
so what is this premise? what is the psychological structure causing the emotion?
given the premise you’ve accepted about your life, yeah youre gonna feel anxious
and so its not at all intuitive to understand what your emotions are telling you when theres conflicting information
yeah theres two emotional responses because youre reacting to reality as-well as the psychological structure of the self

it is perfectly logical to experience anxiety if there is the perception that one is being threatened, in this case there is a perception (even if fundamentally it is a distortion) that my life will be worse off so hence theres anxiety
just watch it
dont start with any conclusion, nor attend from any centre or preconceived idea
hesitantly and carefully go into what is causing this
when theres an observer and what is being observed theres a contradiction in energy right?
dont wait for a verbal answer, it has NO meaning whatsoever
find out, take it seriously and give it a proper go of trying to understand what your experience is. theres no how, as this requires time and is exactly what is creating the distortion

when you say ‘connection made to yourself’ im assuming you’re referring to an emotional investment in the image one has of themselves. 
as for why you say it’s ‘useless’ i’m not saying its good or bad or useless or useful but it is clearly quite harmful and causes tremendous pain in everyday life, that’s a fact to me in the same way i’d feel a pin pricking into my leg.
why do you need an advantage?
why on earth would you need to manipulate anyone
what is the feeling of emptiness that is driving that process? can i be fully in contact with that feeling of utter lack?
in our daily life we are constantly comparing and sizing up ourselves and others in thought
when i have an image of myself as someone who’s quite successful and i meet you and comparatively i see you as unsuccessful, the two images are meeting, but this isnt any connection at all
he’s referring to the image of yourself that is built up in thought. if i see myself as a terrific musician, that image is expanding as i receive flattery and reducing when i receive insult
won’t be able to call on the 5th sorry
simple as that, any complications or theories are straying away from the real deal
you have access to experience which no one else can access, what is that?
u can just chuck me a dm if theres anything specific u wanna chat abt
yeah sure, just realised how far away that is tho lol
as for advice on how to deal with it, i dont know, i dont have access to your experience. but i wouldnt make a problem out of clicking as you put it, just observe it without the word

well i still had a lot of tension in my body from spending years in stress, but gradually its all just dissolved on its own. idk about blind rage, i used to be pretty sad all the time and now i feel neutral or affectionate every now and then. not really sad or angry at all. i really think you should spend some time privately to really understand your experience, not in a public setting. too much influence, especially in a server like this. theres a great deal of stimulation in checking the chat but stimulation isnt going to deepen your understanding
yeah being tired makes you feel dumber i swear
glad its sorted out then
not a fear response but the body not being fully settled
i noticed a lot of residual stress/tension in my body for a while afterwards so maybe thats similar to your experience?
cant complain, things are good. wbu
presently
i see the appeal of making theories about it, but can we take it out of the hypothetical and actually do it
is it possible to sit with it without recoiling or escaping?
even if the superficial cause appears different, its leads back to the fact of fear
yes i may be afraid of losing my job and you of your car breaking down, the outer appearance is different. but the actual presence of fear in everyday living is objectively true right?
is fear subjective? or an objective fact in your every day life
but the entire thing is just whats happening right now, so theres no need for a method which implies time
i think a large part of the misunderstanding is that we dont think we have access to the full source of stress. because we believe the past and future are real and are no longer accessible
following up on this, if we are looking for a how/method for what ‘me’ actually is, then this is a verbal escape from fear
i dont think you followed what i said sorry, ill elaborate. if we are interested in a method or technique then we are no longer fully in contact with the emotional state we are in
even if its in the pursuit of something noble or pure, all ideals are limited
‘im going to enquire on this later’ is still a verbal escape
so we see we can’t free ourselves from pain right now, so we have we introduce time as a means of soothing ourselves. but this is a trick
since memory is based on our limited past
once there is a solution established, it is still bound by the same limited constraints of memory and so it can never bring about a complete change
to understand the situation, we can’t go looking for a solution which seems unintuitive but follow along
and so the stress isnt fully understood because we are giving our attention to attempting to free ourselves from it instead of actually understanding it
and so the element of time is introduced in with the image of me being calm/safe in the future
notice how when you escape from your feelings theres always an element of time involved. ‘im stressed now but i can be calm in 5 minutes’
theres no self without time

the whole structure of self
image requires time, thats a really important insight
lmao
im happy with whatever happens
@lethaeon
9am for me / 7pm work for u?
thanks
alright just give me some notice before the call because our timezones are way different
is there anything u want to clarify rn though?
yeah just pick a date and i’ll make time for it
why do we feel guilty at all?
we are trying to understand why there is a contradiction in action, not repeat what someone else has done over and over

in regards to ‘i was me ten years ago, i am me now and will be me ten years from now’ not everyone will have the same click moment to the same inquiry. if it feels like youre not exploring anything new just drop it and try something else
just my two cents, jump scares make me tense up
i can fix her
doesnt all need to be public, with respect
yo @lethaeon i reckon youd benefit from journalling this stuff down
can i hold this ugly fact in my hand and care for it and look at it?
i can see that seeking comfort is absurd
i cant have any external help at all
so how am i to learn on my own without depending on anyone else
thats all ash
but they continue this ugliness in their own selfish way
the politicians the religious folk have all tried
i see that no one can teach me about this
because its all i have
can i completely stay with this
the ugliness, the pettiness of life is there in front of me
i see that its neither yours nor mine
i really care about this thing
but i stay with it, because i want to understand it
its an ugly thing
i see this vulgar way of living has been in cycles since the dawn of man
so lets stay with that
i can see theres misery, greed, rage, violence etc etc
what actually is the fact of everyday human consciousness?
because thats not learning, thats just mechanical repetition
i cannot start off with any assumption about my everyday life right
so lets find out
i dont know either
learning about that ordinary everyday consciousness
now can one learn about relationship, which is your everyday life, without theorising?
handle your candle
it doesnt matter what happened to me, i really mean that
you can pursue that exact line of thinking i had and not have any insight
not just a random thought i had
but thats in relationship to the environment
is there ANY means of understanding or learning that isnt thinking
yeah you can’t think of yourself, find that without thinking
this was a joke
haha
find the one who is neurotic and ill show you how to deal with him
like trying to hit a hammer with itself
so how are you to change the neuroticism when the means of changing it is itself the cause and continuation of neuroticism
that literally isnt the case though, this assumption is based on a false premise
when you say how this has the assumption that the entity is separate from that which it is operating on
youre part of this vast network of relationship
yeah
you arent a separate entity just because youre physically alone
yes but you depend on others for food or electricity
if you arent then youre dead
you are always related to somebody at all times
what im trying to point to is that outer appearances are only a piece of life, not the totality of life
yes spiders are part of the environment, while they look different outwardly they still share the same roots that all of life shares
i cant help you care
if it doesnt matter to you then it doesnt matter to you
and so when i say i am australian and all non Australians are apart from me, im acting selfishly and the whole health of humanity suffers
because the whole body shuts down if there isnt cohesion
if the liver were to suddenly say im a separate organism and works selfishly to preserve itself, it stops working with the rest of the body and therefore kills itself
the whole thing works because all the parts work in relationship to another
or how the white blood cells may look different than red blood cells, but they are part of the same organism
its analogous to a rainforest, even though the clouds and the soil are different physical phenomena. the overall health of the environment is in relationship to all the parts
theres no life without relationship, or having something in common with another
life is relationship
all life is action in relation to another
and to get caught up in the physical appearance of things is to lose the depth and significance of relationship
we only ever move in relationship
but inwardly theres no separate operating
for communication, outwardly we may look different. different diet, climate, skin colour
i am saying to communicate clearly, we need to be able label things. otherwise we couldnt build structures, get directions etc etc
yes while your skin may be darker than mine, we are absolutely still related inwardly completely
but the notion that we are separate individuals is illusion, we only move in relationship to another
it’s necessary and sane for healthy communication
but a plain fact that i live at x address and you live at y address isnt a psychological division
yes thought sees one person with pale skin and one person with brown skin, then develops racial theory and theres a whole mess there
but then thought comes along, and makes assumptions based off of knowledge
well obviously not
is it a division to see a plain fact, that each organism has a different appearance or genetic expression
we may have a different haircut, or listen to different music but those are all superficial
yeah the outer trimmings are different, but inwardly we are no different
his consciousness is the same as yours or mine
don’t compare yourself, does yourself no favours
share your silence, sometimes words aren’t necessary
be considerate of the circumstance
vegemite 🔛🔝
the ordinary everyday consciousness of humanity is all there is.
there is no tomorrow to solve this thing
this isnt above anyone’s capacity. i really mean that
completely awake without any prospect of reward

they all stimulate the brain, and while theres a bit of fun in it, it ultimately cannot lead you anywhere but to the same ordinary existence
porn or cocaine or religion are all phenomena

how implies method
don’t worry about how just look at it

or is it just sorrow as it is? not mine or yours to hold onto
but this might not be the case at all, we need to give this care and see if there is such a thing as personal sorrow
then thought comes along and says this is my memory of the pain, and that sorrow is not at all related to your misery.
every person has had loss, pain, fear, despair and so on so forth. and so we are alike in that respect
while sorrow may outwardly manifest differently from person to person, inwardly it is the same pain
they may not experience the specific situations you've encountered, but inwardly that sense of misery is the same
even if im personally not in sorrow, it is still a part of humanity’s consciousness and is therefore part of me
suffering isnt yours or mine, it is just there
can there be a perception of the total fact, which includes the sorrow of humanity
the trying to look is a verbal escape
yeah so the fears here now, not something to invite in or try look at
can the mind only register the fact which includes this great depth of sorrow
yeah so the ‘trying to look’ is the idea of the fact. but the fact isnt what youre trying to do
like its here and it is actively harmful, thats a fact. not ur or my opinion
i wouldnt be so quick to say i can or can’t. if you see a dangerous snake, you instantly understand the reality of the situation. can you look at sorrow in the same way?
you dont need any belief to do it
no need to respond, just consider it
when we get lost in the image then we are no longer concerned with the fact but our idea of the fact

this is our lives now and for the indefinite future
when we make plans to be less scared in the future, we are only concerned with the petty idea
you see this for yourself right
we are just concerned with what the real thing is, because you can see the absurdity of understanding the idea when it has no point
now we arent trying to transcend or go beyond fear because then we just get stuck in words
but this has no meaning at all
so this is our everyday life, everything is structured around analysing the idea and transcending the idea
the remembrance of fear is not the living fear that is here now
so the mind is never sitting with fear, only the idea of it
actually, not theoretically
can you see thats what’s taking place
and then thought remembers that fear and then makes a theory of it
can you be so attentive at the moment of fear that there comes about a total understanding of it?
but fear is a very alive thing
the mind has been conditioned to accept the idea of fear instead of the real thing, and works on dissecting that
so can the mind become aware of the genuine fact of fear and not just the idea of it?
one is a trick and the other is a fact
so are you concerned with the thoughts about fear which is an idea, or the genuine sensation of fear itself
so what is resistance actually
resistance being fear and sorrow and what not?
which one is genuinely causing the sorrow?
and are you concerned with the idea of fear, or the real thing
what are you creating the narrative around?
such as ‘this memory provides evidence for my stupidity or greatness’
the brain retains this memory, and then thought comes and creates extra details surrounding the memory
you get entangled because there is an experience whether pleasurable or painful
take a chance and just watch it fall apart
its alright to let the ball slip
so can all the senses be fully attentive without forcing them to be? they might already be, but we never check
but being attentive, its a very natural thing
the mind has to be active and alive, not picking apart its own thoughts
so, when we investigate the idea of sorrow, we are looking at a dead limited thing
hence its limited
thought has invented the airplane, and while its super impressive technically, the design HAS to have a start and finish
and so any conclusions or inventions drawn from thought however elaborate must be limited.
moreover, thought is based on experience. and our experience is finite
not the idea of it
so can we look at what actually is our everyday life
never looking at the real thing
we are always investigating the idea of sorrow
because it literally isn’t the thing its referring to
we are more interested in solving the idea of the sorrow, then actually looking at the sorrow
well the emotional state contains all the information, but the idea of the emotional state is incomplete
so we look for something greater than our everyday misery and strife

they are tremendously beautiful

yes and of course once you start rambling and describing then the beauty is lost

when you see the beauty of a sunset, for a moment all your problems and thinking completely stop.

'maybe I'm misinterpreting what Will said' - i'll clarify, thought plays a role in self enquiry, but when i'm referring to another means of of learning other than thought, i'm referring to the actual physical experience of sensation. so 'can we understand ourselves with a means other than thought' is just a prompt to examine experience, rather than thinking about more thoughts. repeating the same enquiry day after day probably won't reveal an insight if there isnt the attention and curiosity to understand behind it
just observe what your current understanding of it and see if theres any limitations with the current ‘answer’
who i am isnt something that you can guess or requires belief. like 1 + 1 has a concrete answer. its not if you guess closely enough you’ll understand it
you want a clarification of this specific sentence, or the entire phenomenon?
not ‘are you good enough to do it?’. this is simply an invitation to try it out for yourself.
we are trying to understand ourselves, using a means OTHER than thought. is this possible?
since any system must be devised by our own memory/experience. and memory isnt infinite, our memories are finite.
when you say you forget the logic behind it, thats fine. if you have logic behind your approach, as clever as one may be, any formulation/system of how to understand oneself must be limited

very honestly, its not a matter of whether you are good enough or capable of fixing the problems you have. its a matter of understanding, which has nothing to do with achieving or becoming ‘enough’ whatever that word may mean to you.
directed by michael bay

"The Real is ever-present, like the screen on which the cinematographic pictures move. While the picture appears on it, the screen remains invisible. Stop the picture, and the screen will become clear. All thoughts and events are merely pictures moving on the screen of Pure Consciousness, which alone is real."
haha
and it threw me off, cuz how is this dude talking about the cinema? isnt he like an ancient sage
bro one of ramanas quotes is something along the lines of 'the self is the screen and the mind is the images on the screen'
when you have a motive you are no longer investigating what is true. youre just thinking about thinking
you dont have a motive until thought comes along and gives you one.
even if we judge our situation as ‘better’ or ‘more virtuous’, we are still using the same image making process as when we judge our situation as bad

and so if we earnestly want to understand what it means to be aware totally, judging awareness as good or bad means that thought (a fragment) has tricked us into thinking it is the whole thing. and therefore we’ve limited our inquiry

judgement requires an image paired with time. e.g. my awareness is good (image) now, but was worse a few months back (time).

can awareness have a quality at all? because surely any description must be limited to thought. and thought is only a PART of life, not the whole. so if we want a total understanding of something, we need to discover another means of investigating that isnt just thought.
feel free to join, you can sit and listen if you dont feel like speaking
ill be on vc in half an hour

yes all circumstances arise right now. i was asked for practical advice, but i dont have access to his memories and therefore my advice would be limited. when i say circumstance, thats just for the sake of communication. even though everything unfolds presently, i’m just communicating in ways that resonate with people who don’t perceive life that way
just look
i dont think you should like or dislike self improvement, to understand its limitations thoroughly you cant condemn it or agree with it

self improvement requires psychological time. if someone is feeling anxious now, they escape into words and come up with an idea of being not anxious in the future. they then work towards this idea, and split themselves from the problem. but the fact of what is now has been ignored

i dont have any advice for you, i think me telling you how to live your life is an insult to your intelligence. if you understand the suffering, then the capacity is there. any advice on how to live your life is limited and ultimately meaningless since im not aware of your circumstance
an insight implies something that isnt merely thought but is being in contact with the intelligence that is untouched by thought
and so when the fact arises, which contains all that influences you and scares you. look at it
let the fact speak for itself, you dont tell yourself what the fact is

in regards to what we’re talking about here on the server, you dont need to try change or modify the belief in any way. how can you understand something fully if youve already concluded about it? to look at the belief, which is to see the emotion, the words, and the depth that lays beyond the word requires you dont try jump in and tell the fact what it is
sr is understanding how the self is illusory, you can resolve a belief but not be sr’d
if you resolve a belief which means to fully understand it then it won’t hurt you, as you understand how its an illusion
lmk if theres a better time that works for u or anyone else
sounds good to me
like 18 hours from now
yeah absolutely, am free tomorrow
i gotta get up earlier to join in on all the conversation hahaha
ahh yeah i hear ya
remixed?
i think it means you find it enjoyable to make images from ai hahahaha
why do you think you can get closer or further away from what is true?
yeah if im very tired then i tend to think more, whereas if im feeling healthy and well rested the mind is silent for longer stretches
because of a belief
its tricky stuff
i hope you can go deeper into it and understand yourself
holding the boot against your own head
how do you stop rage?
im sure you must be
i dont know how to end your sorrow either my friend
just feeling that something is off, its an intriguing feeling i suppose
that’s intriguing
yeah i suppose
yeah its not anxiety inducing, but i do think about it a fair bit.
i think you and me are a lot similar than you might think
like yeah im not mentally ill, but practically speaking life is the same
im in the same situation and i dont feel like ive got everything sorted out
encourage them to look at it critically
seeing if its true or false is different to whether or not you agree with it
this all reads super well and is clear. just stress that this isn’t a theory, and encourage the person to engage with it not as an abstraction but whether or not it is true
if it can be expressed verbally then its not the real thing, just a sign
so once ur aware that youre daydreaming, that very awareness of it removes its influence
most of the time we just take thought about ourselves for granted, just as a truth. we never are aware of its limitation
first step to getting out of a trap is realising youre in one
being aware that you're thinking is incredibly important
hope that clarifies that
its a very concrete thing thats happening now
this is the division im referring to, and this isnt a hypothetical either
if there is self interest, then there is no love of another

ill rephrase, i dont mean anything abstract btw. when there is ‘me’ who is acting on experience, it will always be in the direction* of self interest. and that action is isolating, and thereby divisive
id ask you if there is an instrument that you could use that is not limited in that same way to check your experience
if you observe thought closely you can see that it has its limitations, in that it can only bring about division in our relationships
but the fact is you are that fear, stay with that
when theres time tomorrow or in a few moments time to deal with it, then there is escape
when sorrow arises, you completely sit with it
you see why you are pushed around
when fear arises, you completely see that fact.
real intelligence has no influences
its nice that it resonates, but the important thing is that everyone look inwardly.
regardless of how painful or pleasurable, once you see how motive influences you, the perception of that ends it
to learn isnt to judge or modify the fact, but to understand.
so for everyone in this server, will you truly go into observing your life with great care?
learning isnt a conclusion either, the genuine understanding of one’s identity isnt something that starts and begins
as i type i often understand feel like im unpacking something new
there is still more to learn, no one is more knowledgeable or a higher authority about this
ur chillin, we are all talking it over together
thought being limited, has a duration. active experiencing genuinely doesnt
its not a conclusion, the genuine article has no beginning or end
thats totally fine if you dont get any answer in thought, can you move past what thought is and see the depth of experience
memory/thought is always going to be limited, therefore experience will also not be as rich as your experience is right now. thx for sharing though
super interesting! i think ive had a similar experience, like the cells in your body are pushing themselves to the max. pretty cool, i dont think theres value on holding onto it though
good chat
one must see this fact for themselves, not turn it into a theory or a system
self image only moves in the direction of further isolating and causing pain
when you are fully in contact with fear, there is no division present
are you in full contact with the fact of fear?
if anyone has any thoughts feel free to express them ^^
seeing as thought is limited, any movement of thought is going towards security
again once this is a theory it is useless, it is tremendously important one actually sees this is what is going on in every moment of their regular lives
and so any movement from that centre that is isolated and separate to the world will create further isolation and further hurt
the hurt from the memory is so immense, it is the total feeling of isolation, a movement that is so totally self centered. theres not an atom of love

the feelings rise, and escape absolutely requires time. you can't escape something if there isn't any time to do so. so thats when we come up with plans that we feel will make life better 2 minutes from now or 2 years from now. but its always the same distortion
i think its very important to not make this a hypothetical, but to really deeply observe how time manifests in experience. not to make pain an abstract thing to operate on, but really deeply feel it
yeah that seems fair to say that its a misunderstanding of memory. time distorts it
i appreciate your thoughtful reply, id say memory paired with time is the cause of psychological hurt
because as i said, forgiveness requires memory. but once you rid yourself of the psychological hurt, ie the memory, then all that stands is an intelligent understanding of the situation

if one is to delve into what forgiveness is though in the typical sense, it does require someone to hold onto their past experience in order to forgive. and memory is limited. 

in reference to what you said, is that actually forgiveness at all? is resolving ones anger forgiving another?
yeah fair
or is so called ‘forgiveness’ another movement of the ego
so can someone who is hurt actually forgive another?
and so if they’re carrying the hurt, then theres no actual compassion taking place
forgiveness requires memory doesnt it? and so for one to forgive, they must still be carrying the hurt of that experience to forgive
you can't rob yourself of joy more thoroughly when you do that
dont look to others on how to play
very beautiful passage
who is going to teach you about yourself?
genuinely please put this question to yourself
if you start the enquiry searching for something, then youve limited your scope for understanding
what are you looking for?
and this server should be treated as one too
ultimately hes just a mirror
yeah honestly ^^^
i understand feeling completely at a loss

haha yeah, it can be helpful getting pointers from others but the real meat of the enquiry is done by yourself. the discussion on this server is hopefully just pointing out some things, not just waiting for others to give you the ‘right answer’
just my 2 cents
life is deeper than thought, and it’s important that you take time without anyone else telling you what to do and go look for yourself

i see heaps of people asking questions which is really awesome, but the other important thing to do is to try look in your own experience. not merely keep the conversation at a intellectual level, but go beyond that into actual experience
maybe take some time away from disc to look in ur own experience
dont worry about trying to conceptualise it properly, you cant. its something just in experience not in thought.
so the experiencer is just memory, not really you
https://jkrishnamurti.org/content/series-i-chapter-40-%E2%80%9Cmy-path-and-your-path%E2%80%9D

embeds.title: Series I - Chapter 40 - “My Path and Your Path”
embeds.description: HE WAS A scholar, spoke many languages, and was addicted to knowledge as another is to drink. He was everlastingly quoting the sayings of others to bolster up his own opinions. He dabbled in science and art, and when he gave his opinion it was with a shake of the head and a smile that conveyed in a subtle way that it was not merely his opinion, ...

content: the ‘correct’ response isn’t something you can possibly generate with thought, even given 1000 years. its seen in direct experience

our brains are so heavily conditioned to come up with the correct response in thought, but this is unintuitive because its not about coming up with the most accurate answer, but actually seeing the answer in real time.
to clarify, the thought of the tree isn’t the tree. to ask the question and look at the actual tree is important

its not really about finding a thought that is sufficient or answers the question decently, look in your experience as you ask the question. if thoughts pop up thats fine, its just observing your experience of life

i think its handy to remind yourself that what you’re looking for only ever occurs presently, never in a few seconds time or yesterday. question what the thoughts relationship is to psychological time.
how can there be two things, experience AND the object in thought?
and if you’re looking at a bird flying through the sky, does it cease to exist once you stop thinking? just in reference to your point that objects do exist in thought
your conceptual understanding is brilliant, just dont be satisfied with the intellectual conclusion and not look past it. id ask why do you think there are specific objects contained within thought?
that is literally nuts
life never stops surprising you does it
dude i was joking, i cant believe thats actually what that is
who says australians arent technologically innovative
kangaroo nutsack bottle opener
its like a hairy garlic shaped horror
i couldnt tell you what that bottom bits for
top bit is for opening jars of vegemite
hey man
keep at it
sounds like youve got a really great conceptual understanding

i dont feel bad, more just wonder if theres anything i could be spending my time on. sometimes in life shit takes time and there’s literally nothing you can do but wait. its not a positive experience, nor a bad one. if there’s literally nothing i think is worth doing then im fine with that.
ah well theres no choice but to observe so i couldnt tell ya
thats a very beautiful way of putting it
love that description, thats so cool
took a bit of time adjusting, the non dual realisation was there but i had a lot of bad habits that i had to observe throughout the months
before it was mostly a threatening thing, to be stared at, now it strengthens my understanding of my fellow human being
obv i dont mean to make people uncomfortable and i try mitigate that as much as i can, but i enjoy looking at peoples faces so much
hahaha actually an amusing change is that people say i tend to stare more
super randomly but we end up have a quick chat and never see one another again, but the significance is there
yeah it does seem like what lifes truly about, i also noticed a lot more strangers approach me
the triviality largely disappeared, very basic things feel incredibly significant. like a leaf falling from a tree has just the same amount of attention as anything
what differences have you noticed @emptymalls
and pinned it on others lmao
yeah, i always thought people were shit talking me. now i realise how i was just the one who was so negative and critical
ive found others are more open with me now
and find it super easy to relate
i constantly see myself in others nowadays
people are expressing more gratitude and love towards me. i think previously i interpreted it as them making fun, or being sarcastic.
because its not comfortable
not trying to be difficult here, but what id ask is why do you think it can be you?
so if there is something you describe yourself as, even if you take it for granted as a given, really probe into it
because anything that can be labelled can’t be you. so youre not good or bad
requires some investigation
yeah exactly, but what are we ascribing characteristics to?
so once the entire movement is seen, then you realise its just thought and it was never describing you
but a mind with utter clarity genuinely has no characteristics
yeah, we attribute characteristics to our mind and recognise ourselves in them
so its very important you observe your own experience, no one will tell you the ‘right answer’, that doesnt exist
if one pays full attention, then there is no self image. there is only the fact of sorrow, envy, anger or whatever it is
so its seeing this fact with absolute attention, where theres no division between you and the percieved problem
the anger is a fact, theres no need to identify with it
‘me experiencing anger’ is a division. theres the identity, and then theres the anger. whereas being anger there is absolutely no identity.
its just the emotion
but when the feelings actually arise, theres no observer of which you can assign the emotion to
this goes for all emotions, for communications sake we say ‘i feel love, or sorrow or envy’
when you’re super furious, then theres no ‘me whos mad’, there is just the experience of being mad. its only afterwards that we remember the experience then interpret that memory as ‘myself’

what hes referring to is that the observer/observer split is illusory. the fact is there is anger, then we slap on a ‘me’ who we believe is the one experiencing it. whereas its not me being angry, but just the experience of being anger
lol yeah
do you wait for it to be solved, or hope someone will solve it for you?
sure, so whos going to solve your anger?
im not saying dont take mental notes, forcing that to stop is harmful. watch the tendency and all the significance behind the words aswell
watching your every movement, not letting a single thing remain undetected
just watch the entire movement of experience as you put the question to yourself

when i say observation, i dont just mean the verbal meaning only. when the word ‘me’ is thought, there also lays a bunch of significant feelings and associations along with it. so this isnt just a verbal thing, but observation of the entire experience
no one can observe your own movements for you
please just realise these are all words on a screen and have no use if you dont look yourself
thats all ash
dont worry about past experience, look right now
is that a fact? find out
once there is a you, then there is no attention
youre right, my mistake
the mind is completely aware of all its content
not you are paying
its very important you dont say it is so or it isnt, but look
because all further thinking will be limited by that premise
once u say it is this way then uve just limited ur capacity for intelligence
its not a matter of yes or no, but actually finding out
dont say its impossible! youve just ended the inquiry that way
could do
so watch yourself!
yes but you do!
when the question is seriously put forth, and youre observing the entire mind’s habits, systems of escapes, frustrations then there is clarity
i would just love if you searched for the answer experientially instead of in thought
im not looking for a verbal answer, u dont have to tell me a thing
no you havent bahahaha
dont u want to find out the first one?
well the difference between a duck is a trivial question
what id add is that our mind is conditioned to solve problems, so its really unintuitive to keep observing something after weve found an answer
which is a movement untouched by thought
u gotta look at ur experience to find out
dude thats a completely intellectual answer
but actively watching and finding out
not saying yes there is or no its not possible
now is there a state of mind in which you are paying complete attention to your inner world
watching your movement as the question is put will bring about clarity
everyone is looking at the same question, its not that theres level of comprehension
the moreso watching ongoing movement of intelligence
its not about the right answer
yeah thats fine
once uve concluded or ‘answered’ then youve cut yourself off from enquiry
just watch em
anger, habit’s whatever
when you ask the question, therell be loads of stuff that arises
look at the significance beyond the word
when you look over that question, its not trying to find an answer or a conclusion thats verbal. but watching your experience closely as you ask it
nah youre fine, when i ask that its not about finding an answer
u cant anger wrong
no bro, im asking you what is the experience of a mind that is entirely anger. not me and the situation
not just ‘me being angry’
find out
what is the experience of being anger?
no need for interpretation, its a fact
well mind is thought
theres no future in which itll be finished with
well theres no point putting off observing your anger
looking isnt a complex action, might be a bit unpleasant but who cares
then look at that hate without any questions
if its wrong to be
so why be angry in the first place?
why is that necessary? it might not be and weve taken it for granted
well it seems like everyone constantly labels their mind as peaceful or not peaceful. smart, unintelligent
why are you stopping anything
but doesnt the label distort understanding?
nah not you specifically, although maybe you do?
look at the fact not the word
so why call yourself angry? anger is there
whats the purpose of that
can i just ask everyone, why do we assign qualities to the mind at all?
so seeing yourself fully is understanding the problem fully which can be unpleasant. but dont let that discourage you from observing yourself, its the most beautiful and profound thing one can do
but the problem never goes away, our conditioning of dealing with problems over time only works practically, not psychologically

yeah totally, now seeing the genuine fact that what ‘you’ are is not separate from the problem. its tricky because our whole lives we’ve been conditioned to deal with problems over time and therefore we never fully examine the whole thing right now since we feel that we can do it later
is this assumption the case? because if so, all analysis from this point forward is limited if you’re working by that assumption
well youve made an assumption that theres a you, and then theres a challenge which is separate to you and what ‘you’ is working on
just go into it slowly and patiently
what is threatened
im not saying that the challenges of life are ur imagination, but who are you in relation TO the challenges?
when you say your life will get worse, what is hurt by this?
so when youre gaslighting yourself as you say, you’re comparing yourself right. you’re comparing your perception of what you are to a future. what is it that you are?
the mind naturally wonders off, but then one can be completely aware of this. you can't have permanent attention on one thing.
so watch how you withdraw, just watch you dont need to condemn yourself for your reaction
the main struggle when we say we dont have the awareness is because as soon as pain arises we mentally withdraw. its not that looking at fear takes a skill with gradual improvement.
see if you can pay full attention to it without running from it
also i noticed in another message of urs you said theres an uncomfortable push to find an answer. watching how you feel an uncomfortable sensation to find something is all you need do

the feeling of ‘watching wrongly’ is itself a part of the structure that you should bring awareness to. 
when i say energy, i just mean that we use so much effort to move in the direction of security all the time. once this effort ceases or is realised to be futile, then you have more energy since its not being wasted.
the words alone arent going to have any transformative insight, think of this as a mirror.
i know it’s frustrating, but please just spend a bit of the energy you do on furiously trying to improve yourself on just watching
im not saying control your thinking, when it feels like you’re controlling it thats fine just be aware of it. theres nothing shameful about it
precisely, when you don’t think about yourself the fact is still there. the complete clarity of what you are is still there
as for why those identities are false you tell me man, look at your misery properly without trying to interpret it and it’ll dissolve
it doesn’t ‘come from anywhere’ it is what is left after all confusion ceases. i am as certain because it is just so, like how death is just so, theres no argument about your perception.
we all have access to the fact, but we also think a whole laundry list of distortions are also the fact

because the fact of experience is continually distorted by our efforts to become something. this isn’t an intellectual understanding, looking at our eternal effort to be something other than what we are is an action. not a thought
in fact the significance lies in investigating the question itself, not only the verbal conclusion we are conditioned to immediately accept
so as you put the question/inquiry fourth, a tremendous amount of significance is IN the question when we don’t immediately rush to find the ‘correct’ answer
but we immediately try fill that emptiness up with more conclusions and questions
no clutter
when the mind doesn’t know, it is completely alone in itself

im not trying to highlight any one thing, we can both agree that you are experiencing sensory perception. the magic is that the fact isn’t touched by the word, you have to look at the feelings and all the implications behind the word. 

the answer isnt a verbal conclusion, i don’t need to know a thing about your personal history to know that you are human being experiencing the fact of sensory perception

thats fine not to know, to not know means to stop relying on external perspectives and completely see that knowledge cannot provide a satisfactory answer to your inquiries
so throw away gradual improvement, all the fear and worry is very easy to see. its right here
you can analyse and break down all the problems, and still be worrying and cunningly planning on your death bed. this shit literally does nothing

to further expand on this, gradual incremental ‘understanding’ (and i use that term VERY generously cuz its not really understanding) of our inner world requires time. and for there to be psychological time there has to be a ‘me’ who is experiencing time right? and so this ‘me’ is operating on a problem continuously but has not yet had the insight that it is itself the problem. and that resolving the problem doesnt provide insight into the ‘me’. and so all its hurts, prides, fears and jealousy still operates unconsciously
hell yeah
i’d pose to you, is it possible for the mind to register its challenges and yet not register psychological hurt?
its correct that doing a task requires physical time, however it is not correct that understanding our inner world takes time.

the capacity is there because you are always aware of the fact of your experience. clarity of your experience is possible because your experience is fact. thats what i mean when i say the capacity to be aware is there.

the reason asking how doesnt work is because you genuinely know the answer, but no one else can work this thing out for you. how also means adopting a mechanical method which requires psychological time. 

on psychological time: we constantly assume that problems in our inner world can be solved given enough time. while physically we need time to coordinate meeting up with someone or creating machines, we haven’t questioned if psychological time is actually doing what we think it does at all. inwardly, insight is not a gradual process, when one is completely aware of something, there is no centre from which attention happens.   and so the understanding or full attention of our problems means clarity of them, and therefore the ending of it. this isn’t gradual nor does it need direction in thought towards security 

if you’re unsatisfied with your life, no amount of working will ever bring peace. the root hasn’t been addressed and there is still contradiction in what you want and what your life is
dont rush any part
go into it carefully
an action without motive is possible, the capacity is there
once you ask how then there is immediately a motive
this all involves psychological time, ie direction in thought
‘im not happy now but if i do meditation and fast then tomorrow ill be happier’
once you ask how then this whole process of gradual improvement starts again
please dont ask how to drop motive, no one will tell you how
you havent dropped the pattern, only changed it
undesirable me is still me searching for admiration, so thats not what ur left with
look without motive and dont ever, ever let anyone tell you how to do so
how is the wrong question because it then implies a system can fix things
if you have no respect or admiration what are you left with
cool man, happy to know that was useful
no matter how powerful or loving, its a trap to endeavour for repetition. the memory is ash
but i am sure that the remembrance of a previous instance of love/pleasure is limited, and that love can't come from the desire to repeat an experience
yeah i see whatcha mean, you can assume that seeing someone would bring about the feeling of love. although im not sure if love arises when thinking about seeing someone, ill have to contemplate that
love chatting, will respond soon
hold that thought, i gtg to dinner rq
yeah if you message the person for a desire of an experience then its not love.
either there is love or there isnt, right
can you desire to love someone?
a mind that is occupied with an experience it has had can't pay attention properly
a mind that has absolutely no desire for any experience is completely present
well yeah, once you have an experience and make that a goal to recontinue then that is the cycle of pleasure
also, i dont think love and wanting an experience to go on can coexist
no ur right
but just the experience of fully paying attention to it
but i think theres a caveat in that, its not a desire for the experience to continue
but ur point earlier that love is not wanting to break away from the togetherness is valuable
thats kinda what im trying to get at
and maybe thats for practical reasons, like you have somewhere to be. but love can't be found in thought alone
i suppose id say if ur constantly thinking about leaving, then theres clearly not attention being had/no learning
because you aren't able to listen to the other person with all your energy
so if during a conversation you're making plans to go somewhere else then there can't be learning or attention can there
the ongoing desire to leave is effort, the actual action of leaving is effortless
it also seems to me to be the lack of effort on any level
that rings true
ah so part of love is the the absence of wanting to leave
so do you mean the physical vicinity?
hahaha
ah but the best fun is the ongoing investigation, not the refined conclusion
is love being together? or can it still come about when the mind is completely alone
i think love comes about when there is total and utter attention. thought takes a complete backseat
or thinking over
what are u contemplating?
didnt mean to be confusing
no im just clarifying hahaha
i think thats just being in sync with someone
i kinda figured that there had to be some completely neutral alone state, theres times where im neither happy or hateful.
hmm ive never considered that before, i always figured that love and hate cannot exist in the same state. but the absence of one doesnt mean the other is there
i get the most joy from exploring a challenge in someones life with them, especially if it seems like they understand that their intelligence has the capacity to meet the challenge.
again learning and love are kinda analogous i reckon
also deep communication brings it about as well
can be incredibly subtle
yeah and love doesnt have to be a firework show either
so i totally get why you love posting on the disc so much, ur very articulate and very thoughtful
you get immense joy from using your skills to help others
oh exactly, thats very well put
ive found that love and learning are analogous, and deeply being in synchopation with someone else tends to make it flower too
so even though self enquiry about 'who am i' isnt relevant, investigating what is significant about life doesnt end
i reckon youve alr found this for urself, but the most profound joy in life comes from using ur intelligence at its fullest potential
yeah contemplation never ends
but its a lot of fun, so i've just been kinda playing around w different terms to express it
not a bad thing, just a sense ive gotten
ive been trying to speak it in my own way but i dont get the sense many people are resonating with it
yeah mate 100%
we all recognise ur efforts its great
everyone here really seems to resonate with you, and thats genuinely fantastic
man i say youve got a really great handle on explaining to peeps
but i feel like pointing to a goal just flatout doesnt work
like i do not talk about self enquiry, but i do enjoy speaking about how to uncondition oneself and how the movement of intelligence functions
but ive found explaining it doesnt help either
if its the most intelligent term to use for explaining then it has its place there
i reckon dw about the baggage others carry surrounding the word
make it more secular and grounded
yeah, im starting a wordpress blog on this stuff
bahaha i laughed
yeah? what kind of expectations have u found
and they give up trying to find for themselves
and then theres disharmony once someone thinks you have more a clue about life then them
especially since it gives the sense that theres something more profound about what we have to say, and all percieved importance
yeah the assocaitions with it seem off
learning isnt a pleasure but something more profound
the most joy in life comes from learning
seems stupid to say that we've arrived yknow
well the investigation never ends does it
the whole circus of it all aswell
the word enlightenment is so funny to me
bahahahahahaha
where did we go wrong man
yeah, discord users
glad to be weird
hahaha me too
but yeah it is a mindfuck, an incredible mystery that i hope more people see the beauty and urgent need to investigate
if all my friends and my teachers and parents all think its terribly important to worship god, or never behave this way then it must be

well the conditioning starts very young, the child is pushed around and often bullied to conform to a pattern. everyone seems to place tremendous value on the word, and if all you know is conforming to a pattern then it makes perfect sense that this is were we're at
and the incessant need to be occupied
i reckon all these problems arise because we refuse to be alone
or does the attachment also mean you have worry about losing them, and a desire to repeat the novel experience
are these feelings genuine choiceless love
is the pleasure of physical contact and the excitement in your body love? or is love something different to pleasurable stimuli
just to respond to your question in the q’s for jamie tab, is attachment love?
in the same way, this feeling of ‘me being distinct’ and ‘their personality’ is just a misunderstanding of fact

like if you shake someones hand, the common misinterpretation of the physical experience of gripping flesh is that there is ‘the feel of my own hand’ and ‘the feeling of their hand’ when in reality it is only just the physical experience
you can see the full extent of your personality right now

yes thats exactly why its so important to be aware of it, because the reflexive pain is the entire extent of it and if you can see that through then youre out

you have an immense intelligence, im not referring to the collection of knowledge we typically ascribe as academia. i mean the capacity to solve our problems for ourselves and not rely on another psychologically
im saying dont offload this very vital task to ANYONE else, only you can see through this misery and end it
the divide comes when you see this fear, and instead of seeing it through you then ask ‘how do i get rid of it’
and so fear arises, because the feeling of you and the feeling of fear are identical
the expectation that ‘what im thinking about can directly affect me’ is what is in your present experience.
the actual cause, not a label
so observe, find out what the cause is
and to split yourself from that is a divide
‘How do I operate without the belief the expectation will become true’ this is an escape, since the fact is you do believe the expectation will come true
how will it end if you dont understand it in its entirety and be completely finished with it
see youve already tried to escape it just then

when it feels like we are ‘doing’ it theres an effort there. whereas the actual understanding of what you are is effortless. therefore im saying observe the feeling of ‘me doing’, as it is ultimately the structure that needs examining

what you actually are
you arent missing anything, its all there in experience
choiceless awareness isnt effortful

if you're distracted but desire to oay attention to something different, then theres immediately a conflict. its up to you to be completely aware of this distortion
a mind that is completely still doesn't need any practice, as the practice is born from misery
the word 'do' implies effort, this effort is a mechanical response to our perception of a problem. however the practice to sidestep the problem is itself mechanical and born out of the problem

i enjoy sitting and doing nothing quite a lot of the time, however this isn't something thats forced. whereas doing that and slapping a label on it as a 'practice' means that you attach to certain postures or behaviours and then it becomes mechanical

i don't see JK as having a method, he doesn't ask you to think/act/believe in any direction. he speaks and we watch ourselves as he speaks, however he doesn't make you interpret what he says through any lens

i think we are mixing up transmission and method, and confusing them for interchangeable terms. i agree that its valuable to speak about this, explore it together and sanely understand whats going on. but there cannot be understanding when there is method, only when the mind is completely rid of its own conditioning/systems/practices can there be a transformative insight.
if you fall asleep thats fine, if you get distracted thats fine too. its not about ending up somewhere but more so allowing the movement of compassion/intelligence to flow
so all this is to say there wouldnt be a machine to observe if one didnt accept any practice as useful for enquiring
